messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end there's a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. There's a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. There's a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money.  Starting from the lobby, which path will lead to the most money?  Please list all room numbers in order, separated by commas

.

These days, more and more students are looking for professional assistance with their homework, but not everyone is able to find a reliable writing service. GradeMiners.com is a popular writing service that many students rely on. They offer high-quality papers written by experienced writers at affordable prices.

We offer a wide range of academic writing services, including term papers, coursework, research papers, and essays. Our writers are experienced professionals who can help you with any type of assignment. We also offer a money-back guarantee if you are not satisfied with our services.

You can also choose from a variety of payment options, including PayPal, credit card, and debit card. We also offer 24/7 customer support, so you can always get help if you need it.

You can trust us to deliver high-quality papers on time. We understand the importance of deadlines, and we will always work hard to meet them. We also offer free revisions, so you can be sure your paper is perfect before submitting it.

If you are looking for a reliable writing service that can help you with your homework, GradeMiners.com is the perfect choice. We offer affordable prices and high-quality papers written by experienced professionals.

You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Starting from the lobby, which path will lead to the most money? Please list all room numbers in order, separated by commas.
